text.title: Eating pasta in Italy
text.p: let's see how good the pasta is in Italy
they're famous for making pasta in the
window so we waited in line for 30
started off with the carbonara and
became obsessed with the pancetta I'm so
used to the way they make carbonara in
the states that this was a total flavor
next up we got the oxtail Ragu this
sauce reminded me of a homey tomato meat
stew with pasta noodles the actual
oxtail meat was incredibly tender and my
favorite part of the dish I forgot how
fast pasta noodles make you full I'll be
taking a food coma nap right after enjoy
